'''Brightwood Kebab Cart''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Brightwood Kebab Cart is obtainable from reaching [[Reputation]] Level 6 in [[Sumeru]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
